description: This file defines functions for managing 'Board' entities in a Kanban board application, including creating, updating, deleting, and loading boards, with data stored in IndexedDB.

methods.name: generateId
methods.description: Generates a unique identifier based on current timestamp and random string.

methods.name: createBoard
methods.description: Creates a new board object with default properties and saves it to IndexedDB.

methods.name: updateBoard
methods.description: Updates an existing board with new data and updates the timestamp.

methods.name: updateBoardEmoji
methods.description: Updates the emoji of a specific board.

methods.name: deleteBoard
methods.description: Deletes a board by ID from IndexedDB.

methods.name: loadBoard
methods.description: Loads a single board by ID from IndexedDB.
